product_name: Timex Ironman 30-Lap Rugged Digital Watch - Women's
long_description: Highly durable and reliably water-resistant, the Ironman Rugged watch includes a chronograph, one-touch backlight and plenty of lap memory to better clock workouts spanning land, water and darkness.
short_description: Highly durable and reliably water-resistant, the Ironman Rugged watch includes a chronograph, one-touch backlight and plenty of lap memory to better clock workouts spanning land, water and darkness.
